numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graphs display the percentages of players of color in different sports leagues in the nation.
2. The graphs display the percentages of coaches of color in different sports leagues in the nation.
3. In some leagues, players of color are well represented.
4. In some leagues, players of color are a majority.
5. In all leagues, there is an inequality between white coaches and coaches of color.
6. I wonder how the graphs have shifted over time since the beginning of integration in sports.
7. At one time, American leagues did not allow people of color.
8. Later, American leagues lifted the ban on people of color.
9. I wonder if the diversity among athletes increased slowly after the ban was lifted.
10. I wonder if the diversity among athletes increased rapidly at some point after the ban was lifted.
11. This situation does not affect me directly.
12. This situation affects people around me.
13. This situation affects my community.
14. The graphs show the representation of people of color in sports across America.
15. Athletes are extremely diverse.
16. In some cases, most athletes are people of color.
17. Coaches are less diverse than athletes.
18. The representation of coaches of color is low.
19. Some employment opportunities may still involve segregation.
20. There is room to improve in the future.
21. This graph depicts the level of diversity among athletes across 5 sports leagues of America.
22. This graph depicts the level of diversity among coaches across 5 sports leagues of America.
23. The headline is: The Diversity and Disparity of American Sports.
